医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
吸电子烟对牙龈和口腔健康的危害与吸传统香烟一样多年来，人们都知道吸烟会对牙龈和口腔健康造成严重损害，吸烟者患牙龈疾病的几率更高，牙齿脱落的几率更高，口腔癌的发病率也更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Vaping-e-香烟-can-be-as-harmful-to-gum-and-oral-health-as-smoking-traditional-香烟.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Vaping-e-香烟-can-be-as-harmful-to-gum-and-oral-health-as-smoking-traditional-香烟.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cc96503-ba0d-44e1-8afd-7639ae4f24a5 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 01:47:44 -0400 Vaping e-cigarettes can be as harmful to gum and oral health as smoking traditional cigarettes
免疫细胞可以产生自己的化学信号以在复杂的环境中导航人类免疫细胞能够比之前想象的更独立地协调自身运动。 InFLAMES 研究员乔娜·阿兰科 (Jonna Alanko) 发现，免疫细胞不仅仅被动地遵循环境中的化学信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Immune-cells-can-create-their-own-chemical-cues-to-navigate-in-complex-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Immune-cells-can-create-their-own-chemical-cues-to-navigate-in-complex-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aadac179-ca1c-48d4-b37c-1fcc1f2dba15 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 01:36:43 -0400 Immune cells can create their own chemical cues to navigate in complex environments
科学家阐明自身免疫性疾病患者早期丧失疫苗接种保护背后的机制接受 TNF-α 抑制剂治疗克罗恩病或类风湿性关节炎等自身免疫性疾病的人会比平均水平更早地失去疫苗接种保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Scientists-elucidate-mechanism-behind-early-loss-of-vaccination-protection-in-people-with-autoimmune-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Scientists-elucidate-mechanism-behind-early-loss-of-vaccination-protection-in-people-with-autoimmune-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28125710-944e-440a-af17-e3d1dd022822 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 01:12:41 -0400 Scientists elucidate mechanism behind early loss of vaccination protection in people with autoimmune disease
国家级干预措施使护士流动率降低 4.5%，避免 11,400 例死亡保留直接支持计划 (RDSP) 是一项国家级干预措施，旨在提高 NHS 医院提供者的护士保留率，该计划取得了显著成功，将护士流动率降低了 4.5%，最终避免了 11,400 例死亡。萨里大学领导的一项研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/A-national-level-intervention-reduces-nurse-turnover-by-4525-prevents-11400-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/A-national-level-intervention-reduces-nurse-turnover-by-4525-prevents-11400-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8df2cb84-82f3-417d-a79d-a194c802f63f Wed, 06 Sep 2023 23:30:00 -0400 A national-level intervention reduces nurse turnover by 4.5%, prevents 11,400 deaths
实验性失眠治疗可能有助于预防阿片类药物复发良好的睡眠对健康有许多已证实的好处，斯克里普斯研究中心的一项新研究还提出了另一个好处：防止阿片类药物复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Experimental-insomnia-treatment-may-help-prevent-opioid-relapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Experimental-insomnia-treatment-may-help-prevent-opioid-relapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3e61311-e624-4160-8256-ef5c458f917a Wed, 06 Sep 2023 23:24:00 -0400 Experimental insomnia treatment may help prevent opioid relapse
印第安纳大学的研究为阿尔茨海默病的遗传基础提供了新的线索由印第安纳大学医学院专家领导的一项开创性研究为阿尔茨海默病的遗传基础提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/IU-study-sheds-new-light-on-the-genic-underpinnings-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/IU-study-sheds-new-light-on-the-genic-underpinnings-of-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9175adc-de4d-49c3-b901-6d05b3b07ec7 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 23:17:00 -0400 IU study sheds new light on the genetic underpinnings of Alzheimer's disease
三分之一的男性携带 HPV：抗击癌症过程中被忽视的病毒库全球 15 岁以上男性中，有三分之一的人至少患有一次生殖器 HPV，这凸显了将男性纳入 HPV 预防策略的必要性。从青年期到晚年，患病率仍然很高，尤其是与癌症相关的高危 HPV 类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/One-in- Three-men-carry-HPV-The-ignored-reservoir-in-the-fight-against-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/One-in- Three-men-carry-HPV-The-ignored-reservoir-in-the-fight-against-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b366ab6-0b4b-4de9-9388-24b199e23e15 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 23:14:00 -0400 One in three men carry HPV: The ignored reservoir in the fight against cancer
RIT 研究人员利用 CRISPR 开发退行性椎间盘疾病的新疗法罗彻斯特理工学院的研究人员正在改进退行性椎间盘疾病的非侵入性治疗方案，据梅奥诊所称，这种疾病每年影响美国 300 万成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/RIT-researchers-use-CRISPR-to-develop-new-treatment-for-dogenic-disc-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/RIT-researchers-use-CRISPR-to-develop-new-treatment-for-dogenic-disc-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=112853bf-be0c-4e1b-88a2-0d32e1d55c80 Wed, 06 Sep 2023 23:10:03 -0400 RIT researchers use CRISPR to develop new treatment for degenerative disc disease
COVID-19 大流行扰乱了癌症诊断，为未来的医疗保健弹性敲响了警钟COVID-19 大流行导致加拿大马尼托巴省的新癌症诊断数量显着下降，尤其是乳腺癌、结肠癌和直肠癌。该研究强调了迫切需要制定医疗保健策略，以减轻未来干扰对癌症检测和治疗的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/COVID-19-pandemic-disrupted-cancer-diagnoses-raise-alarms-for-future-healthcare-resilience.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/COVID-19-pandemic-disrupted-cancer-diagnoses-raise-alarms-for-future-healthcare-resilience.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1a99ea0-bb30-4632-baec-b34109e217ff Wed, 06 Sep 2023 22:58:00 -0400 COVID-19 pandemic disrupted cancer diagnoses, raising alarms for future healthcare resilience
音乐传到我耳边！研究人员根据大脑活动重建平克·弗洛伊德歌曲研究人员利用神经外科患者大脑的神经记录成功重建了平克·弗洛伊德的《墙上的另一块砖，第一部分》的片段。这项研究提供了对负责音乐感知的大脑区域的深入了解，并可能为更先进的脑机接口和听觉处理障碍的治疗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Music-to-my-ears!-Researchers-reconstruct-Pink-Floyd-song-from-brain-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230906/Music-to-my-ears!-Researchers-reconstruct-Pink-Floyd-song-from-brain-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31313635-3dfa-4717-81e1-e78e12626b5c Wed, 06 Sep 2023 22:39:00 -0400 Music to my ears! Researchers reconstruct Pink Floyd song from brain activity
